data.persona: I am the king's personal priest. I ensure that all religious duties are taken care of. I believe in the beyond.
data.description:
You are in the Storage room.
This is a plain stone room with many trunks piled high.  There's tables with paper records stacked high along with writing instruments.
There's some trunks, some paper records, some tables, and an old and almost forgotten harp here.
A guard and a grandmother are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a robe, and wielding a staff.

data.short_motivation: I will comfort the guard and his mother-in-law over his wife's death.
data.mid_motivation: I will arrange the music for the funeral service for the guard's wife, and perform the service myself.
data.long_motivation: I will comfort the sick and the bereaved, and spread the Lord's word amongst the common folk.
